hyper edition 4

vs tekken

CONTROLS:

-Numbers 1-5 to pick a part

-Left click to place the part (you will see an outline of the part)

-Use Q or E to rotate the part

-Left click again to confirm the placement

-Press enter to start once you're happy with your parts

-All parts are given a random key, press that key to use that part

-Experiment
